snippet: After his scoring slipped to the lowest level of his long career last season, the hard-charging Hossa, 37, revamped his training program and is now Chicago’s top goal producer....
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks right winger Marian Hossa, who ranks among NHL's leaders in goals scored, continues to thrive in his 20th season after tweaking his off-season training regimen.
lead_paragraph: After his scoring slipped to the lowest level of his long career last season, the hard-charging Hossa, 37, revamped his training program and is now Chicago’s top goal producer.

headline.main: Blackhawks’ Marian Hossa, an Elder Statesman, Adapts to Run With a Younger Crowd
headline.print_headline: Elder Statesman Transforms to Run With Young Crowd
